feedback: Jenny has excelled in her leadership responsibilities, effectively mentoring Luna and Jeremy.
Her ability to tackle complex technical challenges, particularly in Project Galileo, has been instrumental in keeping the project on track.
Jenny could focus on balancing her deep work time with mentoring responsibilities to avoid burnout.
Jenny has been an excellent mentor, guiding me on React optimizations and helping me grow my technical skills.
I appreciate her ability to explain complex issues in a way that's easy to understand.
Occasionally, she can seem overloaded, which impacts her availability.
Jenny's mentorship has been invaluable, especially her debugging sessions and help with full-stack components.
Her insights into backend complexity and how to address it have been a huge help.
It would be great if Jenny had more time to provide detailed feedback.
I feel I’ve made significant progress in mentoring Luna and Jeremy, helping them grow in their roles.
I’ve successfully tackled backend integration challenges and contributed to Project Galileo’s stability.
I want to improve my time management to better balance mentoring with technical deliverables.
Luna is reliable and has shown strong technical skills, particularly in React and UI/UX design.
She’s beginning to take on more leadership by guiding Jeremy and owning high-value UI tasks.
Luna could improve her delegation skills and work on managing workload stress more effectively.
Luna has consistently delivered high-quality UI components and has been proactive in seeking feedback.
She has the potential to step into a more active leadership role as her confidence grows.
I’ve noticed Luna sometimes hesitates to delegate tasks, which could help her focus on higher-value work.
Luna has been a great teammate and has supported me with front-end challenges.
Her guidance on reusable components has been very helpful.
I think Luna could work on being more assertive during team discussions.
I’ve taken ownership of critical UI components and worked closely with Jenny to align on design goals.
I’m proud of my technical contributions to Project Galileo but feel I need to improve my task delegation.
Managing workload stress is an area I’m actively working to improve.
Jeremy has shown eagerness to learn and grow, taking on new challenges with enthusiasm.
He’s made progress in building his confidence and technical problem-solving skills, especially in front-end development.
Jeremy could work on communicating his needs and challenges more proactively to ensure timely support.
Jeremy has been proactive in asking for help and learning new frameworks.
His collaborative attitude has been a great addition to the team.
He sometimes hesitates to take ownership of complex tasks, which could help him grow faster.
Jeremy has improved significantly in his debugging and full-stack skills since we started working together.
He’s eager to learn, which makes him very coachable.
I’d encourage Jeremy to take initiative on tasks rather than waiting for guidance.
I’ve been working on building confidence in handling more complex assignments.
My collaboration with Luna and Jenny has helped me improve my front-end and debugging skills.
I want to focus on being more proactive in identifying blockers and asking for help when needed.
Adam is highly reliable and detail-oriented, consistently delivering high-quality work.
He has made great strides in stepping into leadership roles, particularly by resolving blockers and proposing solutions during sprint planning.
Adam could continue building confidence in raising tough issues and driving team discussions.
Adam has been a dependable teammate, particularly in resolving critical backend and cloud infrastructure issues.

I’d like to see Adam take a more active role in team discussions to leverage his technical expertise.
